ai-anya-e1005n2:4_0: Moreover, even though you speak like this,
ai-anya-e1005n2:7_0: A hateful person, overcome by hate,
ai-anya-e1005n2:8_0: on the true teaching, the hard to vomit,
ai-anya-e1005n2:10_0: Ket up with the hair and beard.
ai-anya-e1005n2:12_0: The fool who thinks they’re a fool
ai-anya-e1005n2:13_0: is wise at least to that extent.
ai-anya-e1005n2:14_0: But the true fool is said to be one
ai-anya-e1005n2:15_0: the fool is what is meant.
ai-anya-e1005n2:18_0: so long as it has not yet ripened.
ai-anya-e1005n2:22_0: It’s not good to venerate a fool,
ai-anya-e1005n2:27_0: Without house or scripture, who understands,
ai-anya-e1005n2:28_0: a hateful one, or a guilt,
ai-anya-e1005n2:32_0: Long is the night for the wakeful;
ai-anya-e1005n2:33_0: long is the league for the weary;
ai-anya-e1005n2:35_0: the true teaching has not been understood.
ai-anya-e1005n2:37_0: Just as a dead person kills others;
ai-anya-e1005n2:40_0: One who doesn’t see the delicate.
ai-anya-e1005n2:42_0: If you don’t know the word of a moral person,
ai-anya-e1005n2:43_0: what’s known for his own welfare.
ai-anya-e1005n2:52_0: if it is a hunter and a carriage;
ai-anya-e1005n2:56_0: The Book of the fools is finished.
